Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text:
Unfortunately pizza is not true pizza.
The dough is far from pizza dough not even sure what kind of type is that neapolitana? New York? no idea‚Ä¶Ingredients are not the best either. Good place to grab ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text:
Relaxed, casual and very friendly staff & owners. Not much space, reserve or order take away.
Pizza was exquisite! Thin dough, very tasty with fresh ingredients! Came from the Pijp by bike to taste it.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Friendly atmosphere.  Order the pizza with ginger tea.  Pizza is delicious.  Seating outside was a bit close to each other back to back.  Staff was great!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text:
Nice tasty and not pricey pizzas in a very casual environment.
The location is charming and down to earth, with an open kitchen where you can see them preparing the dough and the pizzas. The staff is friendly, they have a ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text:
Ze Best Pizza in Holland! And SUPER vegan friendly!

The only downside of this restaurant is that it's not located next to my house ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Love this pizza place. Little hidden gem behind Erasmus park. Not your ordinary pizza and really nice if you want to try something different from the usual pizza style.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: My favourite restaurant in the West. Apart from a great pizza and kind service, the location has an amazing atmosphere, both in the fresh and quiet terrace by the park + canal and inside, with the random decoration and nice music.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: COLD PIZZA. This place is only good for the location and drinks. The pizza is cold and very strange. Every pizza should be 10 euro given the quality. If you want good pizza go to Mangia or Mangiancora. The location is great but the pizza is very average.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: So glad we took the recommendation of our Airbnb host and tried this place. Diverse selection of craft beer (and liquor) with seasonal rotations on tap along with INCREDIBLE F*****G PIZZA. Get anything with the "raindrop" peppers on it and thank me later. Friendly service as well!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great pizza with gorgonzola (Ruben is the name I guess). Friendly staff. It is a small place but we could find a place to sit. It is near my house so it is very practical.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Highly recommend this restaurant. Nice pizza, nice service, nice view as well. Impressed so much.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text:
Cool little bar and pizzeria - had a pizza oven at the back.
Friendly service and a cool vibe.
I had a Margherita with a bit of chorizo. Lovely.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: The pizza was delivered 30 minutes late and completely cold. I ordered a simple Margherita but all I could sence was frozen chunks of parmesan cheese. Horrible experience. Unfortunately this was not my first disappointment with them.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: This is one of the best and coziest pizza places in Amsterdam. Enjoy it with a group of friends or your date

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great pizza place with a few really delicious options. We always get takeaway and call in advance because it can get quite busy. A few times however, we've asked for the walnuts to be removed from the Geit pizza due to allergies. They always say 'no problem' but it's always forgotten!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Lovely ramshackle little bar. Nice staff good music. Love at first site üòç

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: I love grabbing a drink here in the early evenings. It‚Äôs so picturesque and the staff are great. Plus they have great special biers - as well as their own!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Called TWICE before coming for our ANNIVERSARY to ensure they could do gluten free pizza, told both times no problem. Get to dinner and after some drinks , starters and ordering pizzas, waitress comes out and says it was a new person that ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text:
Nice place, atmosphere is cosy, good music and tasty pizza .
Be aware as last order for the kitchen is 10pm yet I think drinks are available !

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: The food was good but they let us waiting so long while the other people that came after us got their food to go first than us (5 people) same 2 pizzas each of them.. I asked the reason and the guy was so rude..

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great pizza! Recommend the chilli one (pittig) and the Palma. Thin base and crispy crust.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: really confused by the reviews of this place. we ordered 2 pizzas via deliveroo last night and they were literally inedible... the margherita was excessive tomato paste spread on some kind of tortilla/wrap thing. (not actual pizza dough), ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Just gonna say that this pizzeria was recommended to me by an Italian person and he was right and I can only say that the pizza was really good. The staff was super nice and professionals, which is extra nice during this corona times, recommended 100%

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great beer, great pizza and a cosy spot outside!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Delicious, thin and crusty pizza. Very friendly staff. The place looks a bit alternative which I liked, it has a bar feeling and the pizza oven is more or less in the middle of the room. Totally recommend if you want a great pizza in a chilled atmosphere

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: An amazing cook and tasty pizzas!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: We live around the corner from here and feel lucky to be so! This is our favorite pizza place by far. The pizzas are thin, have creative toppings, are always exactly enough, and the staff is super nice. As regulars we can safely say that their quality is consistent!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Best Pizza I have eaten in Amsterdam! Highly recommended!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Best pizza we've had in a long time! Service was really average at first and glasses dirty but the pizzas were worth it. The main dude is super friendly and limoncello was tasty, cheers man :)

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Very nice pizzas and decent selection of draft beers. Right next to the park and a canal so sitting outside is quite ideal on a sunny day. Seating inside can get a little cramped but it's great that you essentially stand in the pizza kitchen with the cooks as the do their magic. Worth a stop if in the neighborhood.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Really bad and slow service. We have ordered pizza and waited for 40 min. Then when we asked about our order - waitress said that she didn't write it down. No apologies... nothing... The only good thing here was the pizza.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Best pizza's in Amsterdam. Have the parma!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great (small) place for a quick bite among locals. With a select amount of tables outside and only a handful inside, this small 'restaurant' (aptly dubbed a 'foodshop') serves tremendous pizza's. Very thin crusts, crispy, fresh ingredients, not greasy at all. Nice Gin&Tonic's as well, and service with a smile. A personal favorite.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: still worth the detour, people are friendly, the pizzas are tasty & original, but seemed to have evolved a bit towards flammkuchen compared to 5years ago. On Sundays, best to reserve a spot

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Delicious, very rich pizzas. Purists might not like the high amount of ingredients that each pizza includes but the result is extraordinary. The restaurant has a very cosy feel with an outdoor area that is ideal for sunny days.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Really disappointed, really expensive for the quality. I am still looking for the cheese and my friend who's ask for no chorizo has a dubble ration. We waited ages for our pizzas and when I went inside I understood why. The kitchen crew is ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: klein maar fijn. small and cozy, if not very comfortable. The seating is mostly on bar stools around a rough hewn wood table. The place has an interesting decor. I forgot to ask about the strange telefoon on the wall.  But we went for the ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great that these guys stand for freedom, we will not forget üí™‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: One of the better pizzas I‚Äôve ever had! Thin crust but plenty of fresh and delicious toppings. Hidden away and only locals which was great.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Very cosy place,and the pizza super delicious,Here sure you have a good time with your friend,and sure you will go back again and again,I never been so close to the kitchen,and watching my own Eyes how they made my pizza cool! ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Very kind service, lovely location and pretty decent pizza. The only downside is that they are pretty busy so finding a table is hard and the wait can be long, but overall a great place to go.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great thin crust pizzas. Vegan options too. Also pretty vibey outside on a nice summer eve.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Terrible service. Ordered a glass of red wine which tasted sour/off. The waitress tried it FROM MY GLASS, and I refused to drink it. Yet they still charged us. Simply disgusting.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great pizza. Good service. Affordable menu items. Lovely terrace for the summer time.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Very nice fresh pizza from a wood oven, nice selection of beers and wines. Staff is friendly and in the summer you can enjoy your food outside.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Probably the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had? Creative flavor combinations and Wonderful vegan options

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Nice pizza, nice place. Bit too expensive

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Delicious pizzas and the tiramisu was amazing! They have a good amount of outdoor seating so it's a great place to go when the weather is fab.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Best pizza in town and the most cozy place. Great people with good food and drinks

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Really nice place. Well-priced pizzas and other food. Decently fast service. Good for an afternoon snack

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Pizza is bu far the best around, but cheesecake is also quite good!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: This was my local, however things are really slipping here. Its such a shame as service used to be so good.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Buurman & Buurman offers a great pizza, positive atmosphere and an outstanding terrace. It's my favorite spot in Bos en Lommer by a long shot. Protip: there's a Pok√©mon stop right next door you can drop a lure on and catch a few while you grab some well deserved drinks

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Had an amazing pizza, plenty of veggie options and the beer is great. Very welcoming and laid back.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Banging pizza's with plenty of vegan options and very gezellige vibes at this lovely little restaurant. Feels like dining in a old family friend's living room

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Super tasty pizza and homemade beer! The vegan options are really good!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Lovely pizza and beer on a nice versatile outdoor terrace. The fact that it's off the beaten path only makes it that much more attractive.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great atmosphere, nice fresh tasty pizza's and a good selection of drinks.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Amazing pizza. Great taste. Really friendly staff. And you can even pay with bitcoin !

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Tiny and cozy, wood oven takes up about half of the room, haha. Great pizzas and salads!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: The place is nice and the attention is really good but they kept us waiting a lot of time for our drinks and food. And also I think it‚Äôs too expensive

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great pizza place. Salads come per day and are delicious. Recommended by all means

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Excellent service. Delicious pizza. Great beer.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Pizza Salmon is different and delicious. Really like the atmosphere. Highly recommended.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Nice place with an outdoor seating by the canal. Good Italian food and very good sodas!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great pizzas sat by the canal. Perfect place to spend a sunny evening.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Beautiful location, super nice service and overall very cozy. Pizza was OK.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: One my favorite places to grab a beer. Really friendly staff and great pizza.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great pizzas, friendly staff and nice canalside setting

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: One of the best places in BOLO to catch up with friends, grasp a beer, and eat delicious vegan pizzas!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Excellent pizza. Good choice of beer. Shabby chic decor.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great pizza and all else.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Exceptionnal Pizzas and Tiramisu, don't forget to order the antipasti if you're really hungry as you can experience some waiting time - but really worth the wait!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: I'm not a fan of their pizza but it's a cozy place to get a beer with a friend

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Probably the best pizzas i ate. Seriously. And i ate pizzas all over the world. You must try it!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Cool pizza place near a canal. Great local craft beer also

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: My favourite pizza in Amsterdam,  Amazing Pizza!  The best you will find in Amsterdam.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Great pizza and nice salads. Love the laid back atmosphere.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: One of the best pizza in Amsterdam. Highly recommended...

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Good selection of beers, nice pizza and place where the locals go

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Wood oven pizza and nice selection of quality beers. Next to park with benches outside in the sun.

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: Amazing vegetarian pizzas! perfect for when you get that pizza craving

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: SUPER tasty pizzas and cosy place for a beer!

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Mmmm ..... delicious pizza and beer !!! Nice staff! I recommend this place 100% ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) A great little restaurant run by 2 local heroes. You can eat special and delicious pizzas, it is cozy with a good beer list. Remember it is always busy and you cannot make a reservation so sometimes you have to wait ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) You can only eat pizzas here (and pick up and delivery), but they are of very good quality. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Really quality pizza. Bottom that breaks perfectly in your mouth. Is not crazy in such a fantastic brick oven. And the staff's passion and enthusiasm drips from words. In short, highly recommended 10/10 would ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Good pizzas with thin crispy bottom. Unfortunately, quality varies quite a bit each time. The staff that serves is also not always attentive and attentive. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent pizzas. Fine dough. Large choice of beer.

(Original) ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) This is a real gem for the neighborhood. Small-scale, very cozy restaurant / food shop. It is actually always busy so you may have to wait a while, but it is worth it. We always go for the delicious homemade pizzas ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) It turned out to be more flammkuchen than Italian pizzas, disappointing. The one I ate also had little taste. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Excellent pizzas and a wide choice of suitable (alcoholic drinks). Do not complain that there is no cutlery because that is not appropriate. The desserts with white chocolate cheesecake and homemade lime cello ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Special pizza Parma ham with truffle chutney, good neighbor & neighbor beer (blond lower), or sit outside due to limited space inside, which actually just went in terms of temperature. Enthusiastic service ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice place. Good and nice staff and tasty pizzas. It is also not the standard drinks that are on the menu that makes it slightly different. Will definitely come back ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) is this irony? most pizzerias in the Netherlands are now half shoarma tents and there is no Italian in the kitchen anymore. Fortunately, two typically Dutch boys felt called upon and now bake better pizzas than in ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Pizza as it should be. Good fresh bottom, tasty sauce (just a nice layer instead of a very thick filler layer) and fresh tasty toppings. Delicious really a must! Furthermore, it is cozy inside with friendly staff. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) They call it the best pizzas in Amsterdam, but I'd rather call them the best pizzas in the world! I have seriously never eaten them so well than at this place. And the new pizza goat is really unbeatable! ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) The service can be more efficient but the pizzas are tasty and the dessert makes the long one more than good. Cozy terrace, nice place! ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Cozy but by the design somewhat cluttered pub with different beers and delicious freshly made brick oven pizzas. Service is very friendly. You can also sit outside. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text:
(Translated by Google) Nice beer and delicious pizzas. Cozy terrace.

(Original) ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text:
(Translated by Google) Here you can eat the best pizza in Amsterdam. The recipes, original without being blasphemous, offer pleasantly surprising flavors.
Five stars ++ ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) I had a reservation for Christmas Eve. Just checking whether they were open 'yes, yes'. Unfortunately we found a closed door. A relaxed atmosphere is fine, but a sloppy schedule is wrong. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Always chill food, good atmosphere and a terrace in the sun. Operation is quick and quite cheerful despite the fact that it is very busy. Tables may be cleaned a little better, but otherwise fine ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious pizzas with a nice thin bottom. Good mix of classic Italian and bold flavor combinations. Nice people too! ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Hip tent with tasty pizzas. In terms of drinking, there are only expensive, organic fruit juices. They don't have a coke ;-( ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Superb pizzeria, pizzas are incredible and inventive (artichoke with truffles ...), served by super nice and efficient staff on a background of soft music. I recommend very warmly. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Phenomenal! Relaxed atmosphere, super nice people and for me the best pizza in Amsterdam. Always worth a visit. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) The pizza crust is a bit like cream cracker, and the Margherita has little cheese and a little too much sour tomato sauce. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious pizzas, especially the Parma pizza is very tasty. It is fairly small but the atmosphere and the condition are good. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice location, cozy atmosphere but the pizzas are the main reason for wanting to come back here. Absolutely great! ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) The pizza is very tasty. But I'm not going back. The waiting time is one hour to one and a half hours. As if you are starving. That is too long. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice place, casual, tasty pizzas, on request the pizza is adapted for the children, nice service. A bit tight in terms of design, but with fitting and measuring that all will be fine. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Cozy place with a terrace on the water. Perfect for eating a pizza with a nice beer. Friendly staff that thinks along with you. Atmosphere. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman
